title: France : number of public primary schools 2005 to 2018
summary: Overall Number of public schools has decreased over the Year.
Number of public schools is slightly decreasing from 2007 to 2009.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2008 and 2009.
The highest Number of public schools, of value 49928.0 was reached at Year 2007
The lowest Number of public schools, of value 48975.0 was reported at Year 2009
